name: Coming back home
description:
Hi everyone, this is my first game that is #madewithunity and also my first #OGAM with the tool as well. I hope you guys enjoy it.

It tells a story of a guy who, for some reason, can't really remember what happen with him. You'll help him figure out by collecting memories. There are two kinds of memories: good ones, and bad ones.

After you've collected enough amount of good memories, the game will go to the ending part and the man will be reunited with his famiy
